import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const Homepage = () => { const [name ,setName] = useState('') const [message,setMessage]= useState('') const data = {name:name,message:message} const sendMessage = () =>{ axios.post('http://localhost:5001/auth/message',data).then((response)=>{ console.log(response) }) } return (
Gayathri Krishna
Hi Friends, I know many of you have been trying to reach out to me but are unable to do so. That's why now i'm available in this website.You can ask your questions by submitting the below given form and i'm more than happy to connect with you.
setName(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Homepage
